title: Smart Knowledge Transfer using Google-like Search. (arXiv:2308.06653v1 [cs.SE])
abstract: To address the issue of rising software maintenance cost due to program comprehension challenges, we propose SMARTKT (Smart Knowledge Transfer), a search framework, which extracts and integrates knowledge related to various aspects of an application in form of a semantic graph. This graph supports syntax and semantic queries and converts the process of program comprehension into a {\em google-like} search problem.

translated_title: 使用类似谷歌搜索的智能知识传输的研究
translated_abstract: 为了解决程序理解挑战导致的软件维护成本上升的问题，我们提出了智能知识传输（SMARTKT），一个搜索框架，该框架以语义图的形式提取并整合与应用程序各个方面相关的知识。这个图支持语法和语义查询，并将程序理解的过程转化为类似于谷歌搜索的问题。
tldr: 研究提出了SMARTKT，通过一个类似谷歌搜索的框架，将程序理解过程转化为语义图查询，从而解决了软件维护成本上升的挑战。
en_tdlr: The study proposes SMARTKT, a search framework that converts the process of program comprehension into semantic graph queries, addressing the challenge of rising software maintenance cost.
